definitions.definition: The name of any of a number of members of the Herodian dynasty who ruled in the Roman province of Judea , most notably Herod the Great , who ordered the Massacre of the Innocents , or Herod Antipas , his son, who met Jesus during his Passion .

main_definition: The name of any of a number of members of the Herodian dynasty who ruled in the Roman province of Judea , most notably Herod the Great , who ordered the Massacre of the Innocents , or Herod Antipas , his son, who met Jesus during his Passion .
